summary: This bill directs the Secretary of Defense to develop a strategy to treat obesity as a disease and reduce its prevalence in the Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Space Force.  It mandates an educational campaign, requires assessments of existing programs and reports to Congress on obesity's impact on readiness. Furthermore, the bill calls for a Government Accountability Office (GAO) report to analyze the Department of Defense's obesity-related programs and offers recommendations for improvement.
